DataElement.preferredName: Health Care Professional Ability ENABLE Coach Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indication of whether the health care professional has the ability to be the ENABLE coach.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Health Care Professional Ability ENABLE Coach Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person qualified to be engaged in activity directed at preservation of mental and physical health by diseases prevention and treatment as a source of livelihood.:The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment._A telehealth approach for palliative care targeted to rural patients with advanced cancer or other serious illnesses and their family caregivers._Someone who teaches a special skill (e.g., how to implement a treatment or intervention)._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person qualified to be engaged in activity directed at preservation of mental and physical health by diseases prevention and treatment as a source of livelihood.

Concepts.definition: A person qualified to be engaged in activity directed at preservation of mental and physical health by diseases prevention and treatment as a source of livelihood.

Property.preferredName: Ability ENABLE Coach Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment._A telehealth approach for palliative care targeted to rural patients with advanced cancer or other serious illnesses and their family caregivers._Someone who teaches a special skill (e.g., how to implement a treatment or intervention)._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment.
A telehealth approach for palliative care targeted to rural patients with advanced cancer or other serious illnesses and their family caregivers.
Someone who teaches a special skill (e.g., how to implement a treatment or intervention).
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.
